text: Chīsai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina kōi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yōsha wa hontōni kōdaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijō butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
